Review.Titre: Filing a Better Biz Bureau complaint next.
Review.Contenu: On December 29, I ordered (by phone) the Reflect Mini BT Bluetooth Sports In-Ear Headphones.I was told that it would be $50.10.  I specifically told the guy I wanted these cordless Bluetooth headphones as I use them in my business & I have to be able to walk around while on the phone.He shipped me the wired JBL Reflect Mini In-Ear Headphones with In-Line Mic instead - which I can't use.After I received them I looked online - trying to make sense of what they'd done & found this ad which I screen-captured - which I can't seem to post here.I found, an ad for the "wired" headphones they "erroneously" sent & they were on sale for only $39.55.  So even though I didn't want these, if I had wanted them - they were hosing me on the price at $50.10.Nonetheless, they sent me the wrong ones so I called & the guy (who after much discussion and weasel-ly attempts to the contrary) said he'd give me a Return Authorization for a full refund & email me a label.  I also did a screen-shot of it & the Label's tracking info which I couldn't copy here.I sent the product back promptly - on 1/5/17.By the way, I went over to my local FedEx location and spoke with a guy there who I always deal with.  He told me that FedEx picked up the package at the post office where I dropped it and delivered it to another post office in PA.  They have no way to track it beyond their drop-off.  I believe I've done everything I could have in this case to comply with World Wide Stereo's RMA requirements can't get back my money from these people.  They conveniently keep saying they haven't received my returned product back yet.  Since they sent the label to me, how is that my fault?Next stop, Better Business Bureau, Social Media, then Amazon.Steve Parker

Review.Titre: I still don't have my order

Review.Contenu: In this review I want to give credit where credit is due, so I'll start outright by saying my initial experience with World Wide Stereo was quite good! During my process of shopping around for the home theater solution that was right for me, I spoke with lots of different sales people from lots of different stores and online retailers. I have to say, my conversations with worldwide stereo during this process were among the most enjoyable and helpful.I would even say that I was impressed with how quickly they shipped my home theater system to me. All said and done I think I got it in like three days.However, once I got the theater system set up, that's when I first experienced my first issue. Now, just so you know, the system I bought is legitimately a plug and play system--you really have to try to mess it up. Well, what happened was one of the rear surround speakers was defective. It never worked correctly from the get-go. The other identical rear speaker works beautifully. So I contacted worldwide stereo to get the problem taken care of. When I told them about the defective speaker, the first question I got asked was if I kept the box that it was shipped in. I quickly answered no. I never save packaging for items that I purchase, with the exception of Apple products because of their high resell value and because there's often things in the packaging that I might use later, like extra cords or chargers.Anyway, when I said that I did not have the original box, the customer service representative told me that they would have to charge me 15% for a restocking fee. I thought that was very unusual, as I do a lot of online shopping, including all kinds of purchases have electronics and speakers, etc. The representative went on to say that it's industry standard practice. I reminded the representative that were talking about a defective product. It's not that I didn't like the color or some thing--the product I paid for didn't work out of the box. The representative stated that that did not matter and provided me a link to the part of the website that explained returns and exchanges. I ended up reading the entire webpage, end it seems to indicate the defective items are handled differently than simple returns or exchanges. I still don't think their website makes it clear enough that when they sell defective products to customers that the customer is responsible to pay fees if they don't have all the original packaging. This is an absurd customer service practice. I quickly went to several of their competitor websites to review their return policy and found nothing like it. So much for an industry standard.That all took place on a Saturday, and then I got a call from them on Monday. The lady that called and spoke to me basically treated me like I was out of my mind for thinking that they should take care of everything in regards to getting a working product sent out to me. She was argumentative, and frequently cut me off while I was speaking. At one point I asked myself, am I a customer here that spent hundreds of dollars? She's treating me like I'm trying to rip them off, when in fact it was them that sold me a product that didn't work. I'm simply just asking for the product I paid for, and not be charged fees for a box. Are you kidding?I will not be spending another dollar at World Wide stereo. I will purchase directly through the manufacturer, or from another third-party.

Review.Titre: I think I received a recycled product
Review.Contenu: I think I received a recycled product. I unfortunately did not recognize that until I had placed a static cleaning arm on the deck of the turntable, which is a stick on. There was a piece of felt glued onto the underside of the tonearm where it rests on the mechanism which raises it. This is not how it ships from the manufacturer,  I checked with them. A further week after xth of the month, I rang WWS customer service and asked what was going on, I was told "it might even be in the warehouse now" and, contradictorily, "we'll call you when the replacement's ready for delivery". Almost a week later, still no news, I get the feeling that I'm being spun a line and that delivery could be age away. But, I was offered the refund, and declined, that said, based on the "it should be in by xth of the month", but will give it another week or so, then chase down that refund I think.

Review.Titre: I ordered a Yamaha Aventage RX-A880 and…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a Yamaha Aventage RX-A880 and received  it yesterday. My daughter received it. When I got home I saw the AVR on it original packaging that was dirty and slightly damaged. I immediately open it to check on the AVR, I was disappointed to see that one of the wifi antenna was damage. I replaced it with my router antenna which look the same then test if the AVR work. Luckily it does. I want to complain about it but I read about other customers bad experienced with your customer service. Your company courier, in this case Fedex, is not good.  I saw it on my security camera that the Fedex delivery guy just drop it on the front door without care before knocking on the door. I hope that you take an extra care on any fragile order by placing it on a box not just ship it as it is. I have ordered online several time with other vendors, e.g. B&H, they place all orders on a B&H box and they really put extra care on their delivery. I don't recommend this online vendor specially when ordering fragile items.

Review.Titre: I bought one PXC 480 headphone on World Wide Stereo
Review.Contenu: I bought one PXC 480 headphone on December 3rd. It actually had the trouble engaging the various stages of the NoiseGard active noise cancellation feature. To be precise, the multi-function switch cannot be set to “IT”. That is to say, I cannot leave the switch in the position of "IT", and I have to keep it with my finger all the time when I am on the phone. I do not think that it is normal and there's nothing wrong with this headphone. As so far, the problem have not been solved. At least, I have not received any reply even though I have returned it to them.  At the same time, When I feedback the problem to the seller, I have no idea why they can not deal with this immediately. And they told me they were willing to re-ship a new one until they received the headphone I returned. Why they cannot deal with the problem while they receive the feedback of problem from customer? So, the problem of item from seller have to be borne by customer and make customer have to wait for more time? The seller cannot deal with the problem immediately? One month passed, I did not get any reply. At the same time, it also delayed my use due to their distrust of their customers, I think.

Review.Titre: Good price, fast delivery, bad service
Review.Contenu: I saw an ad for some v400 speakers on sale for Black Friday. I've never heard of Korus before, but the speakers sounded perfect for my mother who was getting tired of dealing with WiFi and BT connection problems with her Bose and then Sonos. The Korus speakers have SKAA signals which sounded to be much more user friendly. At the sale price that they were,I couldn't pass it up. I ordered 4 speakers that came in pretty quickly and they sounded so good that I order 4 more. The initial salesman said that the micro-USB dongles were not included and if I called Korus directly, then they would send me some at no cost. I tried calling and emails and couldn't get a response from Korus and then called World Wide back to see if they could help. The next salesman told me that he would call Korus and get back to me. I didn't hear back for a few days and called again. They said they are still trying and give them a little longer. I never heard back from them. Don't tell me something just to get a sale that was never going to happen. I finally got in touch with Korus and they couldn't believe that World Wide was telling their customers that they would send out those dongles at no cost. Anyway, the speakers sound great.

Review.Titre: I ordered 11/16 and it’s still not here.

Review.Contenu: I had an order cancelled by WWS for apparently no reason. As I read through the Trustpilot reviews, I see multiple people experiencing the same problem with WWS. I'm now one of many. The similarities:* Placed an order for a not-inexpensive item ($900).* Order is cancelled the next day, for no apparent reason.* I logged into my bank, and the transaction shows as having been fully processed -- i.e., it's not in a "pending" state, but is in with other fully executed transactions.* Called WWS Customer Service (CS), who said that she can't see (in her system) why the bank cancelled the transaction, but that it's in a pending state at the bank, and will "drop off shortly" -- and that I need to contact my bank to find out what happened. - I informed her that the transaction was not in a pending state, but rather has been fully processed, and so won't be "dropping off" without further action. - She replied that WWS will process a reversal on the transaction, and I will see a credit. Okay, fine -- but that means the bank didn't reject it, right? - She tells me (again) that I need to contact my bank to find out what happened. - She states that the purchase cannot be reinstated, I will have to go in and place a new order, and recommends that I use Amazon or PayPal to make the payment next time. (That's not a problem, but I want to understand WHAT HAPPENED. I'm an engineer; we need to do a root-cause analysis before trying the same experiment again.)* So I called the bank, who confirmed that the transaction has been fully processed, "the vendor has the money from this transaction," and that there is no issue from the bank's end. (Minor note: two weeks earlier, I'd tried this same transaction at WWS and the bank DID reject that purchase, because it was a "new vendor that I'd never done business with before." They put in an approval for this vendor, and a couple of weeks later I went back and processed the order I'm speaking about here.)* I called WWS CS back, and was told that "credit card orders can be rejected for any number of reasons -- address problems and phone number problems are two very common reasons for orders being rejected." I have neither of those -- the address is correct, same address for billing and shipping, phone number is correct, all the planets are aligned. - I told him that there was no problem with the order at the bank's end, and that the bank says that the vendor has the money for this transaction. - He then acknowledges that it was WWS who cancelled the order, not the bank (this is the first time that WWS actually acknowledged that THEY cancelled the order -- which means that my call to the bank was a waste of my time, and the bank's time). He assured me that a reversal on the credit card transaction will be done "immediately." (I'll be checking on that...) - I asked why WWS cancelled the order, and was told that they have the prerogative to cancel any order they want, but that I can place a new order and use Amazon or PayPal to check out. - I don't disagree that the vendor can cancel any order it wants, but I also want to know on what basis was my order cancelled. I'm told that, for my protection, they can't tell me that. (And again, I can't disagree with the "for your protection"; they have no idea whether the person they're talking to really is the credit card owner. So, no issue there.) - I informed him that an order being cancelled for no apparent reason does not build confidence that a second order will be processed correctly, and that I will need to go to another vendor. He replied that he understood my reason for wanting to go elsewhere; I think he might have even preferred that outcome for some reason.The people I talked with -- the operator and two CS people -- were all very nice. I did feel that I got a bit of a run-around by first telling me that I need to contact my bank to find out what happened, and then later being told that it really was WWS who cancelled the order.What really troubles me here -- and the reason I decided to post this review (and in this level of detail) -- is that the experiences of several other reviewers on here were nearly identical to mine: WWS blames the bank or credit card, but these are credit cards that have been used for years and are working fine elsewhere. WWS gives no explanation for the mysterious cancellations. WWS recommends placing a new order and using Amazon or PayPal.In a way, I feel I am lucky, as I also see there are numerous cases of late deliveries on products (although the shippers are also running late these days as a result of COVID) as well as delivered products that are somehow damaged or discolored. This is a gift, so I obviously want it to be in "giftable condition" when it arrives. I placed a new order directly from the manufacturer, rather than from WWS.I'll update this review as I get more information....

The item arrived in good shape but the tape on one side of the box had split. Given the weight of the player, it wouldn't take much more for it to fall out of the box. Heavy and valuable items should be double-boxed to survive the rigors of a UPS journey.

Review.Contenu: I like the product and the shipping was lightning fast.  However Masterpass Checkout was not working only at this site, so it wasn't a Masterpass issue itself.
Some boxes from my order were obviously preopened, or factory recertified, but everything works so far. Also, some items were not shipped in a shipping box.
They sent me 2 pairs of speakers instead of 1. The cost and aggravation of sending them back I decided even though I didn't need. Them to keep them.

Review.Titre: good service, but the items was not as great as I expected.
Review.Contenu: ordered ear buds for my teenagers, 2 in fact, they were not as good as advertisement lead me to believe, still using them but disappointed in product.

Review.Titre: Ordering it alone is too much work
Review.Contenu: Ordering it alone is too much work. They always cancel the orders. Also noticed feedback whenever I increase the volume.

4/5 items shipped from my order, areceiver and speaker system.  I was expecting all items at once and then realized that a tower speaker was not delivered. I called support, they told me that the item was shipping from another warehouse on the west cost and will delivered on the 15th. I relayed that I spoke to the person handling my order the day before items shipped and he told me that all items were in stock in the local warehouse and the expected ship date. I asked cs why I did not get any information on the missing item from the shipment. They could not provide me with an answer. I was surprised that WWS does have a notification system in place for this type of a situation. Employees that answer the phones are not rude, but are not pleasant, they give the impression that they do not want to answer the phone and help customers. I did received my missing speaker yesterday. This was not a good experience for me and WWS. I hope this helps your company's progress.
Still needed an additional part that they didn’t mention after I called and told them my vehicle, vehicle type, and vehicle trim.

Review.Titre: Bait and Switch- Updated- Energy is owned by Klipsch
Review.Contenu: Link was for a Klipsch 2.1 sound bar. Order was placed, paid with Paypal, received no order update showing items had been ordered, only Paypal receipt. The item that arrived 4 days later was an Energy 2.1 Sound bar.Went to website once order was received and looked up order number on packing list, and according to their records the item that was ordered was an Energy sound bar. No recourse on my part.  Oh well....lesson learned ****Update****Since posting this review, I was contacted by a Emily C. from wwstereo and she has explained the advertising link I used to access their site was setup by a third party. She also explained the reason for confusion is that Energy is a subsidiary of Klipsch. She offered for a representative to contact me from Klipsch if I had any concerns about the quality of the product I received. I refused the offer as I am satisfied with the quality of the product I received, I just felt like it was not as advertised, again by a third party. So I am updating my rating solely because wwstereo cared enough to contact me promptly to address any concerns. I will consider ordering from them in the future.

Review.Titre: Shipping speed was good but the…
Review.Contenu: Shipping speed was good but the condition of the box that the product came in was in very poor condition.

Products were great, but the shipping experience was a bit of a nightmare.  The order consisted of three items, two of which shipped from Pennsylvania, arrived via FedEx Freight earlier without any issues.  The third item shipped from California.  A delay with FedEx picking up the package resulted in the delivery date being moved from Thursday to Friday before Labor Day.  The delivery address is a Call Center for my company and handles FedEx Freight and Express shipments all day.  Since the package shipped as Home Delivery, it didn't get delivered with our daily Freight or Express runs.  The driver made a false claim that he made an unsuccessful delivery attempt at 5:20.  I called FedEx and made arrangments for another attempt on Tuesday after Labor Day via FedEx Freight.  Despite this, the package was delivered on Saturday and left unsecured at the drop-off location.  I appreciate that World Wide Stereo is not responsible for FedEx's lack of professionalism and failure to follow instructions.  However, the choice to ship my item as Home Delivery resulted in the package not arriving along with the regular deliveries that Friday.  Communication and consideration would have gone a long way to mitigate the hassle I had to go through just to receive my item.Thank you.
The earbuds were not like what was pictured on news 12 for New York.  Am somewhat disappointed.

Placed an order for a 65" 4k tv. I received a confirmation email which stated that i would get my tracking number shortly. The tracking number that was provided was incorrect based on the destination of that package. I ended up making three attempts to get the updated tracking information. When the television arrived, i was going to do my inspection. The driver told me that my inspection instructions were incorrect, and that i just needed to sign the paperwork. I disagreed, so he made a phone call to his manager. Seems like there is miscommunication between the shipping company and World Wide Stereo.  Third issue was that the tv was damaged at the corner. That was very disappointing. I did notify the customer service of World Wide Stereo. This time around they were very helpful with my issue. The communication was clear, and the issue was resolved.  I did receive a new tv the following week without any issues. The driver did not know that he had to pick up the damaged tv until he called his supervisor. World Wide Stereo really did try to fix the issue, and worked with me so that i would be satisfied with my purchase. Few things kept me from writing a better rating. Maybe my experience with World wide Stereo might be better next time IF i decide to buy more items for my entertainment room.
The earbuds were stolen from my front door before I could even listen to them.
Experience was OK as you met your stated policies, but no wow factor.
Good Service, but did not follow-up on applying 5% of first buy.
After unpacking I noticed a chip/scratch on the mount

Review.Titre: the items took along time to receive
Delivery was prompt for cross country
Review.Contenu: Delivery was prompt for cross country. Might have been wise to require a signature to avoid porch pirates, but wasn't a problem.

Three days later UPS attempted to deliver my product. I did not receive my product because UPS arrived when no one was home and a signature was required. Now I must wait another three days to get my package. Not happy, but I do understand.

Review.Contenu: Did not ship when it was supposed to, it was a day late. When paying extra for faster shipping it is expected to be shipped on time. Fortunately it wasn't a major issue so I will not ding them too badly. Everything else was as expected.

Review.Contenu: Chris from car installation made a full speaker and sub quote for me. He was informative and knowledgeable about what he was talking about. I decided to just do the head unit and front camera. The whole system was a little out of my price range.

Review.Contenu: I found the amplifier I was looking for at a good price refurbished from a company that gave a guarantee and free shipping. So far it’s working great and I’m very pleased with it the only thing I don’t like is they didn’t give a manual with it

The only issue was on the carrier's side: packages came in from both UPS and Fedex and therefore didn't come on the same day/time and Fedex was delayed by several days while never giving a specific delivery time and requiring a signature. It meant that I spent a whole day at home waiting for a package that ended up being delayed at the last possible moment. However, once everyone got to me, it was in perfect condition, well-packaged, and functional.I'll very likely use WWS again, in the future.

product great!your service excellent!packaging for transit - oopsunit showed up in very bright white SONY box on the front step all day for all to see.By luck I had passed by during lunch hour and nabbed it my self.You shipped fedex - that's what you get.....fedex around here leaves a little to be desired.next time use UPS!

We saw a review on Amazon where someone had to open the subwoofer to reconnect a wire that came loose. My boyfriend got up at 6am to go to lowes to get a T15 torx bit to open it up and once it was reconnected, it worked perfectly.

I am brand agnostic and believe most of audio quest is snake oil pricing when  Actual science is used to determine their claims. Just wish you had other quality but reasonable priced interconnects.

Review.Contenu: Check out was easy and pricing was on point! We only have about half of it set up and WOW is it nice! Shipping was fast, but the boxes arrived damaged. There were also metal pieces sticking out of the other boxes....which was weird because I don't know where they cake from. They confirmed my cart qualified for the discount, but were not able to fix it viz internet chat. They gave me their customer support number to call to resolve the issue. Although it was a slower, tedious process, it all worked out eventually. Almost not worth the 5% savings, but overall, no serious complaints. The customer support was very nice, and what saved my review from being a 3 star review.

Review.Titre: Product was as advertised and delivered…
Review.Contenu: Product was as advertised and delivered quickly. The box, which was not packaged inside another box, was left on my doorstep. The bottom had fallen out of it and foam packaging etc. Was falling out of the bottom. I took pictures. I'm not sure if this was a delivery issue or an original packing issue or other. I do think it should have been placed in another box for better shipping. Item seemed ok and seems to be working fine.

I purchased a Marantz CD6007 from you and the unit arrived late due to snow storms across the US.  But that is not why I have given you a "4 Star" review.  My reason for this score was due to the fact that you changed the price of the unit on me after I had asked to be notified when additional units were again back in stock.  That said, Crutchfield, who I typically purchase my stereo equipment from also raised their price by $100 as well.  Nonetheless, by me stating that I wanted to buy this unit from you at $499 I feel as though you should have honored that price.

Review.Titre: Great product and anybody who want's …
Review.Contenu: Great product and anybody who want's remarkable sound quality, along with Volume it is the perfect choice. The ordering process and customer service was very good. FedEx stood up with the dilemma and I was able to have it delivered  to Walgreens. I was then able pick it up after normal hours so it all worked out.

Review.Titre: Nice website, well packed item, slow delivery.
Review.Contenu: Everything was great--delivery was too long. I live in Nashville and my Tivoli radio was shipped about 250 miles southwest of here. Then rerouted via USPS to come that many miles back again. Sad that it was on a truck that passed my house ( approx 1 mile!) 3 days prior to delivery. Bad logistics.Otherwise all is good. Lovin my Tivoli and got it for best price on the net!Thanks guys just get better shipping options.Patrick

When my order failed to show up I contacted Worldwide by email. Worldwide quickly discovered my order was returned to the warehouse by the shipper. In response, they shipped a replacement the same day and upgraded the delivery option at no cost. In spite of the delivery problem, I feel confident in doing business with Worldwide again based on the excellent support I received.

It would be less surprising if the website noted that the customer's credit card information will be verified by a phone call.  While I appreciate the caution with all of the fraudulent activities going on, I have never before had to talk to my credit card issuer and a WWS representative just to verify my information.  Other than that, this was a painless purchase.

great experience the only hiccup I had was the website it gave me an error message the first time I ordered ( no confirmation) but I did recieve an email shortly after that was the confirmation. also whoever they ship through wasn't very careful with my package as it had tears on the side of the box luckily the box was well insulated to handle all the bumps it must have taken.

I like it you have Affirm makes the purchase easier I have a hard time moving around on your site it seems confusing but I endured it because you have products that I like and want I hope before Christmas I’ll get a different TV I like your selection That you have the latest products and technology

But other than that, great speaker with great sound. Perfect for trips to the beach or lake or even at home. The range is good for my uses (about 50 feet or so, it could be farther, I'm not that good with distances). Great speaker overall.

However, after checking the website periodically, I found them, ordered them, and they were shipped to me very quickly. I will use World Wide Stereo again.

Review.Titre: This is my first major turntable…
Review.Contenu: This is my first major turntable upgrade and World Wide Stereo offered many options to choose from. Most importantly their selection covered a wide price range. I’m comfortable knowing that I can start with an entry-mid level turntable and again upgrade my hi-to in the future. I’ll certainly be looking to World Wide Stereo for other system options and upgrades such as my speakers and amplifiers. Other than that, purchase, delivery was non-eventful.  Tested items and worked with no problem.  I'm no electronics techie but they seemed to work with no problem.  Items would be used for future gifts. Browsed websites products and items looked worthy of further shopping scrutiny.

Even though I didn't get it in the time frame I thought I was going to get it, I did eventually get the item. the only thing I wish worldwide stereo would have done would be to give a discount or better shipping because of the delay.other than that the communication on the issue was great and I received the item later in perfect condition.

Otherwise, service on the site was great and the package arrived well!  Thank you!

Had I not picked it up from the post office due to a delivery miscommunication, my wife would have seen her Christmas gift sitting on the front porch with pictures all over it of the item. More importantly, any Scrooge stealing packages, which is very common these days, would have had an easy target seeing a sound bar box just sitting on the porch.

The selling price and service from WWS was great. I called ahead to confirm the estimated delivery date since I knew I might be out of town later in the week. The only thing preventing me from rating this at 5 stars is that once I tracked the delivery, I found out that a signature was required. I had to quickly run home from work B4 FedEx showed up. If I had known this at the time of the order, I could have made other arrangements. The Project Carbon Debut turntable is a great product I am very happy with it so far.

Product is as described. Delivery took longer and I had to call to find out what the hold up was. They did help get it delivered after a few phone calls. Price was within range of other companies and they are authorized dealers which makes a difference should you need Warrenty on your products.

Somehow, I put the wrong delivery address and didn't realize it until a day or two later.I called customer service, but it was after hours. Tried again the next day and Ira, one of their associates, was very helpful.  He contacted FedEx and basically took care of everything. Followed up with me later that afternoon and also the next day. Needless to say, the gift arrived to the right address and, most importantly, it was still delivered ON-TIME. Great service, great experience!

the product took awhile for me to figure out as the instructions, like most have more varieties for different languages than English .. as though English is being faded out ... after taking over a week to figure out the product is working good, overall good for the price

Review.Titre: My experience with my stereo purchase....
Review.Contenu: I ordered a stereo system that I believe was very fairly priced. However, I would have liked to have had all of my speakers and components delivered at the same time by the same freight service, FedEx. I had to wait on several items to be delivered. UPS severely damaged a speaker that had to be replaced and I haven't received it yet, but it is on the way. I was disappointed that I wasn't able to listen to my favorite CDs on my birthday, as this system was a birthday gift to myself. I would suggest to World Wide Stereo to NEVER ship via UPS to anyone. Every item I have ever had delivered by UPS had been damaged. I will personally never use UPS to ship anything for me.

If this is the case, you are of course welcomed to wait until you have received your package or service before writing your review."If it were my company I'd focus on shipping. People are getting used to 2 day, free shipping. Or at least keep the customer more updated to the process of their shipment. If it's going to take some time, even relatively, explain why.

This was my first visit to your site after seeing a number of daily deals posted on other sites for electronics gear.  I purchased 2 DB headphones that were on sale.  Use of the website was quick and delivery was prompt.

Review.Titre: Everything was delivered on time but…

Super fast shipping, in fact a little too fast. I tried to cancel my order 20 mins after placing it, and was unsuccessful. But their CS rep was quick to respond and update me. Can't fault them for that.
I Love my new Purple Record Player. It has great sound to be so small. It's great for It's size. Will refer friends to buy your record player.
Was very pleased with my order. Easy order process and very quick delivery. Headphones were exactly what was described and packaged well. Thank You Much                                    Cory

Review.Titre: good product would buy from again.

So I bought a pair of Polk in the ear headphones.  This thing was great after trying out few ear pieces that come with the earphones.  Love it no complaints here.

Review.Titre: Confession — I've been a supplier to…
Review.Contenu: Confession — I've been a supplier to World Wide Stereo for many years and know their staff and leadership team well.But, as an avid consumer who loves recreating music in my home, I'll speak from a different position now.Learning how to choose and blend the hundreds of brands offered in today's marketplace with the goal of achieving musicality, dependability and ease of use takes years of experience and a focused commitment to excellence.It is RARE to find a group of people who not only share the same desire to exceed their customers' expectations, but to delight them by opening a window onto the world of music they might be unaware of.Music is our single universal language of human expression that changes and evolves every single day.  This language enriches our soul, allows us to time travel back to moments of intense personal meaning, and give us the gift of solitude in a world that seems crazy by most measures.A well designed and installed HiFi system powerfully connects you with the artistry and passion of musicians the world over that have dedicated their lives to expression using sound as their medium.The people at World Wide Stereo have dedicated their lives to enriching the places you live, work and play in, and are exceptional at their craft.I urge you to let them show you how they can help you too.My finest - JBevier
